title: MEAS MECH_ENG 495-0-21 Selected Topics in Mechanical Engg

instructors.instructor_addr: Technological Institute, Rm A116, 2145 Sheridan Rd, EV CAMPUS

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Thin films play an important role in many technological applications including microelectronic devices, magnetic storage media, surface coatings, and recently stretchable electronics. This course provides a comprehensive introduction to mechanics-related topics involving stress and defect formation in thin films.

subject: MECH_ENG
